page.title: 08Holiday Camps
page.content:
Corton has four large holiday camps, all of them capable of catering for up to a thousand visitors a year. Corton Caravans and Holimarine are family orientated camps.They provide facilities for children and adults.Warners is an all adult camp with no children allowed.It concentrates on adult entertainment.Corton Beach is more for the unattached or young person.All of them are self-catering but have extensive restaurant facilities, shops,swimming pool and games rooms.
Corton Caravans Tel 730264. Warners Tel 730226. Corton Beach Tel 730266. Holimarine Tel 730939.
